name: Hilton Nottingham

reviews.text: I stayed here for 2 night in July for work. I've stayed in other Hilton hotels before so I had pretty high hopes that this would be comfortable stay. The good/bad points that I found are as follows:
reviews.title: Definitely not what I'd expect from a Hilton

reviews.text: Good:
reviews.title: friendly, clean and relaxing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: *Location - right in the city centre shopping area but no clubs etc in that particular street to keep you awake. If you want nightlife then the main bars are only a few minutes walk away
reviews.title: Great location, shame about the rest!

reviews.text: *Gym/pool - not the biggest, but it's clean, modern and has long opening hours
reviews.title: Brilliant!!

reviews.text: *Check-in - we arrived just after 10 but they allowed us to check in straightaway
reviews.title: Never Again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: now i was under the impression that the chain "hilton" was meant to be one of the best... and after staying at the "deansgate" hotel i thought it was...... is the nottingham hotel an after thought?? we had to ask...
reviews.title: ermm not what we expected

reviews.text: the hotels location is slap bang in the middle of nottingham, near the bus and train station and towered in by a block of around 500 run down flats.. not the nicest view first thing in the morning...
reviews.title: Pretty average

reviews.text: the initial room we had was like a shoe box, so we upgraded, this room was ok... NO MINIBAR! no fridge no bottled water or room safe.. oh and windows that didint fit properly in the frame.. but apart from that.. twas ok..
reviews.title: Impressed
Not bad.
reviews.text: food - the dining experience was more like that of a cheap, spanish, all inclusive! to be told.. "welcome to the hilton... tonight you serve your self....." was a little bit of a shock.. food was alright, nothing special.....
we were there for 2 nights for the thorntons choc weekend.. that part was superb.. no complaints there...
reviews.title: Great city centre location and super friendly staff!

likes.liked: — Location in city centre - great for shops, restaurants and general wander around city
likes.disliked: — Corridor floors were a bit creaky

reviews.text: The Hilton is in a great central location and all the public areas are great - modern and clean.
reviews.title: Great location

reviews.text: My room wasn't as impressive. Despite being described as a deluxe it was in an annex - no lift to this bit - come out of the lift at the 5th floor, go round a couple of corners, up a couple of flights of stairs. As soon as you went through the doors to the 6th floor the whole decor changed - old carpet, faded walls etc. The room was OK but not what I was expecting (although there was a nice flatscreen tv). I imagine the rest of the hotel has been updated and decorated but not this bit.
reviews.title: pretty good

reviews.text: The staff were very good and professional. And even though my morning shower was disrupted by a fire alarm (out in the street in my dressing gown and slippers is always an entertaining start to the day) this was soon resolved.
reviews.title: Average

reviews.text: I'd stay here again. But definitely not on the 6th floor!
reviews.title: Good Location, shame about the room!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised by this hotel, compared to the mixed reviews on here. We shared a triple (family deluxe) room between 3 adults - room was nice and spacious, comfortable beds, everything very clean, and fairly peaceful, certainly no street noise despite central location. Some of the other guests were there on stags etc but we didn't get disturbed, luckily. The pool was lovely and the steam and sauna were nice and hot! Service was slightly flaky but friendly and welcoming.
reviews.title: Stayed with Tesco Clubcard Deals
Much better than expected
reviews.text: Spent a couple of nights here last weekend. Excellent, friendly service from all staff. Usual superb Hilton breakfast. Evening meal a little on the pricey side for the quality of what was on offer, but very good, light hearted service.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A bit taken aback when the waitress on seeing that we were quite happy with the service, asked if we would mention her name on the customer comment form. Then came back with one for each of us, with pens, to fill out while she waited. It appears that Hilton staff get bonus points if they get mentioned in customer feedback.
reviews.title: Good location but hard to find

reviews.text: Room was very small, but well equipped with large LCD TV and all the usual trappings. larger than average, well equipped bathroom, with good shower over bath.
reviews.title: Surprisingly impressed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A friend on another floor only had half the housekeeping carried out in his room on one night.
reviews.title: Not a Hilton.....or 4*
Bed Bugs
reviews.text: Very convenient multi-storey car park directly opposite, but at £15 a day, it's a pity Hilton can't arrange a discount.

description: Explore the shopping and cultural delights of historic Nottingham from Hilton Nottingham hotel. This Nottingham hotel is a beautiful Victorian building situated in the heart of the city center, with contemporary décor and furnishings throughout the interior. Featuring a 60 foot indoor heated pool with Jacuzzi, the longest hotel pool in the city, a fully equipped LivingWell health club and fitness center and a business center for corporate events and business guests, this unique Nottingham hotel is a delight for guests visiting historic Nottingham on business or to take in the sights and sounds.Step into Nottingham restaurant Nicholson’s Bar and Diner and enjoy modern and stylish American cuisine in an upscale diner setting, perfect for group dining or intimate romantic meals. Choose delicious cocktails from the extensive drinks menu and relax before a sampling the popular and lively night life that Nottingham has to offer.
